dsOverview.title: NCEP Version 2.0 OI Global SST and NCDC Version 4.0 Extended Reconstructed SST Analyses

summary.p: The NCEP OI is a weekly and monthly 1 degree global analysis dataset that is available for November 1981 through a current date. The analyses are determined by blending marine surface observations (ICOADS and others) and satellite AVHRR data using an OI method.
The NCDC ERSST Version 4 is a monthly 2 degree global analysis for 1854 through a current date. EOF methods are used to create these grids using marine surface data (ICOADS).
Various climate indexes (e.g. SOI) are available from the Climate Prediction Center

Recent weekly OI SST plots and other products are available at
NOAA OI SST Analysis page
Go to Merged Hadley - OI V2 SST and Sea Ice Concentration dataset for a new surface boundary dataset for uncoupled simulations with the Community Atmosphere Model (CAM).
